title: Learn about the most important interpretations of seeing a building in a dream

preview.html: Based on a dream: The dream of building has many interpretations, depending on the shape of the building that the person saw. The vision of a mosque differs from a church, as well as a house or a school. Some expect that there are indications related to marriage in it. It is the dream, and if you see that you are building a beautiful house in your vision, this indicates On the symbols of joy in this dream. Reality and we are preparing during our topic to explain the most important interpretations of the building in a dream. Based on a dream, the interpretation of dreams about the building symbolizes beautiful meanings for lawyers, especially if the person is looking for his stability and happiness, so he begins to focus on his goals, abandons laziness and fear of it, and turns strongly towards his future. Thus, he has achieved many goals and achieved success even if he faced failure in the past. One of the signs of the appearance of a building in a dream is that the interpretation emphasizes modifying the dreamer’s behavior and his tendency to change soon. If the person is the owner of a project or trade and sees that he is building a large house, then The dream symbolizes an increase in his profits in this trade and the fulfillment of his desires, and it is possible that he will soon increase them and establish another project next to it, and building is better than demolishing in a dream because in the second case, unfortunately, a person loses a lot of his life and money. Building in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if he sees The sleeper is that in his dream he is building a large and huge building and has great authority in society. His dream interprets that he will take some of the next steps for the sake of society and save people from corruption and sadness. It also indicates joy for him. If someone has a small project, may God protect him and grant him peace. To his dreams of this work.Seeing a building in a dream interprets a happy change in a person’s life. If he commits many sins, he will immediately turn away from them, especially if he builds a mosque for the people. The dream also shows the beauty of his life and his love for everyone. It is expected that the building will also be a symbol of a long human life and response to God’s calls. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Building on a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. The dream of building symbolizes good and good conditions in the interpretations of Imam Al-Sadiq. One of the signs of an unmarried young man seeing a building in his dream is that it indicates marriage and achieving a good future for him.. The old man confirms the achievement of what the dreamer seeks in the near future. Building on an individual’s dream. The dream of building for a girl represents many signs, including that she is one of the beloved and successful personalities who is very patient until she achieves what she wants and tries more than once to achieve her ambitions and does not feel impatience or despair. If she was a student, the interpretation confirms her great success in her studies. It can be said that seeing a huge building in a dream for an unmarried woman confirms the great upbringing of her parents and raising her to do good and love everyone and not hate them. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about love for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about love in a dream for a single woman: The feeling of a girl in a dream usually portends the exchange of sincere feelings of love with someone and the start of a new partnership with a formal association with the positive steps that she will take in the coming period, but the interpretation of the dream depends on various factors related to the details of what she sees in the dream and the relevant realistic circumstances. The connection surrounding it, and here is everything related to the interpretation of a dream about love in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about love in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she had a successful love experience in a dream and exchanged sincere feelings with a person who is passionate about her, then the interpretation here carries two clues. : Either she thinks about it a lot and wants to live it, or she goes through a quiet and lasting period on various levels and this is reflected in her dreams with a sense of certainty. Love, even if it is complicated for her in the dream and she does not feel comfortable, shows the state of tension and anxiety that she is already complaining about in reality. Usually in this type of dream, the person’s reality and what he lives is accompanied by what he repeats in the dream, and this indicates, with his feelings and happiness, the closeness of her relationship with her. Who you love in reality and maybe the wedding. The celebration will take place in the near future.Interpretation of a dream about love in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin sees in a dream the interpretation of love for an unmarried woman that it carries a sign that her life will be more stable during the coming period, either from intercourse with a suitable person who provides her with all the ingredients that You want her to live happily, or on a practical level to achieve a large part of the desires that she has planned and planned for, but when she confesses in a dream that she has someone she loves and she denies him and tries to escape from him, which means that she faces personal problems that prevent her from enjoying her life and begins to engage in other ways that help her succeed. While she receives sincere love in a dream with welcome and happiness, this indicates that the coming period of the fortuneteller’s life will be full of goodness, success and pleasant events, and it is not required that they be connected only by communication, but on all levels related to her life and achieve happiness and psychological stability, even if This recognition is what insight craves. In fact, the interpretation of a dream about love in a dream for a single woman here is linked to what is happening in her subconscious mind and occupies a large part of her thinking. Go to the Secrets of Interpretation of Dreams website from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about manifestations of love for single women indicates the exchange of loving glances between the dreamer What is strange in the dream that she met him for the first time is that she is in a hurry to make an important decision in her life that may be entirely related to her personal life or related to some aspect of her professional life, but if in the dream she feels that she has known him for a long time and between them there is a relationship of friendship and solidarity, the dream symbolizes The completion of her marriage in the near future and the beginning of a new marriage. Life and responsibility with those you love. Interpretation of a dream about confessing love in a dream for a single woman. If a girl dreams of someone else

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a hedgehog in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog by Ibn Sirin: A hedgehog in a dream is evidence of deception by some people in the dreamer’s life. If someone sees in a dream that he is carrying a hedgehog, this is a sign of distress and lack of livelihood. Seeing a hedgehog inside the house in a dream is evidence of some inconveniences and difficulties that the dreamer is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog For a man: A hedgehog in a man’s dream is evidence of the presence of a girl in his life. Slaughtering a hedgehog in a dream is evidence of marriage in the near future, if he is single. Education For a man: In a dream, a hedgehog is an indication that a romantic relationship is passing. A slaughtered hedgehog in a young man’s dream may indicate travel or marriage. If a man sees a hedgehog in his bed in a dream, this indicates that he is a person who is afraid of betrayal. A black hedgehog in a man’s dream is evidence of a delayed marriage contract or separation. A white hedgehog is evidence of kindness and nourishment. Seeing hedgehog blood in a dream is a sign of forbidden money. Seeing A man sees a hedgehog in a house in a dream, then there will be disputes with his household. Interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog for a single woman. A hedgehog in a dream, a single girl, is evidence of the presence of a man in her life. A slaughtered hedgehog in a dream is evidence of a marriage contract. Seeing a hedgehog in a dream is generally A sign of kindness. A black hedgehog in a girl’s dream can be a sign of disengagement and separation. A white hedgehog in a girl’s dream indicates a wedding and a white dress. Interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog for a married woman. A hedgehog in a dream, a married woman, is evidence of her husband’s stinginess. If a married woman sees \ MarriedIn a dream, her husband slaughters a hedgehog, and this indicates that she will soon become pregnant. A hedgehog bite in a married woman’s dream is a sign of bad news. A hedgehog in a married woman’s dream can be a sign of trouble that she will get into. Interpretation of a dream about a hedgehog for a pregnant womanIf you see a black hedgehog In a dream, this indicates a male child. A white hedgehog in a dream holds a female birth certificate. A hedgehog in a dream Pregnancy can be a sign of problems and difficulty in childbirth. A hedgehog bite for a pregnant woman in a dream is evidence that she heard some bad news, which is an unpleasant vision. Add The dream you would like interpreted in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and explain it.

title: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing broken glass in a dream?

preview.html: Broken glass in a dream and the interpretation of seeing it Broken glass in a dream is one of the most important visions that we find many people searching for, due to the inability to be sure whether it brings good to the dreamer or brings a lot of evil and harm, so now we will get to know some of these interpretations. Interpretation of dreams of breaking glass If a person sees in his dream that he has glass, but it broke from his leg, this means that the person who sees this vision will face many financial crises in the coming short period. If a person sees in a dream that there are some cracks in the glass that caused wounds in his hands, this is evidence that the dreamer will suffer a lot of bad gossip about him and various criticisms, so he must be very careful. But if a person dreams and sees broken glass in a dream, it may be a sign of his emotional or marital life and in both cases he feels many negative effects on his emotions and feelings. Still can't find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian site for dream interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about glasses If a woman sees in a dream that she has a set of glass glasses, this means that this woman is one of the luckiest women and that the coming period will feel more secure and reassured, but these cups contain an amount of water. If an unmarried girl sees glass glasses in her dream, this may be evidence that God will grant her a righteous husband in the near future, in a short period of time. As for the unmarried girl who sees broken glass in a dream, it may have another meaning, it may be a sign that this girl is trying to achieve a goal, and that she will be able to achieve it next time. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin's dream of a cup? If a person sees in a dream that he has a set of cups that are beautiful in their external appearance, bright and attractive, this means that God will bless the dreamer with abundant and wide goodness. But when a person dreams of this previous vision, but the cups in his sleep are full of dirt and contain a lot of dust and contacts, this vision indicates that the sleeper will face many problems and sorrows in the coming period. Broken glass in a dream If a person sees in a dream that he has a set of Glass cups, but these cups have some fractures, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will face a large number of problems and obstacles in his life in the coming period. If a man dreams in a dream that a car is in front of him and that he breaks the glass in it using a certain tool or by hand, and that he breaks it on purpose, then this vision is evidence that the dreamer is always trying to reach the best positions at work, the vision, and it also indicates that he will advance to a better job and will have great joy and satisfaction. Interpretation of dreams of breaking glass If one sees in a dream that he is breaking the car window, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will go to a wider and better place through which he can obtain great happiness and joy. title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing a balloon in a dream?

preview.html: Hadota gives you a complete interpretation of a balloon in a dream. The balloon is known. It is a large balloon that floats in the air and has many uses around the world, including transportation, trade, and recreation. Seeing him in a complete dream is one of the visions that came in a complete dream for many people, so we have gathered you, my dear ones, in God. For you, our followers, the interpretation of seeing a full balloon in a dream for a married and pregnant person, as well as for men from the books of great scholars who interpret dreams and visions. Someone interested in this dream should follow the article. Why dream of riding a balloon in a complete dream? The interpretation of seeing a balloon in a dream is one of the visions that have many interpretations and differs from one person to another, but the balloon in the dream as a whole indicates goodness, prosperity, and happiness. Seeing a balloon flying in the sky in a dream Kamel shows the dreamer that he wants to travel and move from one place to another and it is a sign of positive changes in his life. Also, the dream of flying in a balloon is one of the undesirable dreams for interpretation, but this is a sign of sadness, problems and bad things that happen in the dreamer’s life. The balloon falling in The dream is a sign of failure in life and work, it is a sign of losing money, failure and success. Flying in a hot air balloon in a dream completely denotes happiness and stability, and this is good news for the dreamer for a calm and stable life without problems and sorrows. Landing in a dream filled with a balloon indicates to the dreamer That he will be sad and enter his life with many problems, worries, and intense longing. See also: Why do you dream that you are flying in a dream and its meaning? Why dream of a balloon for a common woman? Interpretation: In a dream, a balloon flew for an ordinary woman – news for the girl about a future life full of happiness and prosperity and an indication of future joys and pleasures. Riding a balloon in a dream is full of visions that indicate getting rid of worries and relief from depression, as well as the end of the problems and sadness that the girl went through in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing an ordinary woman’s balloon and climbing into it as evidence that there is a suitable man and man for her in her life and that they will end their lives with a happy marriage? Cutting and dropping a balloon in a dream is an unwanted vision, which indicates the failure of her life, the dissolution of the engagement and the inability to consummate the marriage. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a roof in a dream and its meaning? Why does a married woman dream of a balloon? Seeing a married woman flying in a balloon in a dream Complete evidence of stability, happiness, and the end of the disputes and problems that plague marriage. A falling balloon in a dream fills a woman with unwanted visions that indicate problems and obstacles, and evidence of her inability to overcome these problems. But seeing an exploding balloon in a dream is evidence of the failure of her marital relationship, It is also a sign of their inability to reconcile and her separation from her husband. Flying a hot air balloon in a dream is full of good visions that characterize her with kindness and blessings in her life and a testimony to kindness and support with abundant money. See also: Why dream of seeing air? Seeing a balloon for a pregnant woman in a dream

title: Interpretation of looking down in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of neglecting to look and turning a blind eye to religion, which is a constant lack of interest in what God has forbidden, such that a man does not look at a woman with lust and a woman does not look at a man with lust. Lust, it does not look at the blessings and gifts in the hands of others, and praise be to God for His providence. To see a person closing his gaze in a dream indicates piety and piety, protection from sins, disobedience, and avoiding what. God is in visions and dreams. Follow us on the Vision website. Poor eyesight in Islam. God has bestowed many blessings on man, and one of these blessings is a great blessing, which is the blessing of sight, with which we see everything beautiful. Of great reward, as well as a feeling of peace of mind, peace of mind, and freedom from evil and desires. God Almighty mentioned in his book about lowering the gaze, and God Almighty said: Tell the believers to lower their gaze and guard their private parts. That is purer for them. Indeed, God is aware of what they do. And say to God Believing women who lower their gazes and guard their private parts, and do not display their adornment except what is apparent, and let them cover their bosoms without regret The religion of their adornment Because they are their fathers, their fathers, or their fathers, their children, or their children, or the sons المالالية their women, or what their faiths possessed, or the two followers, other than the first of the men, or the one who did not appear Perhaps to know what they hide from their adornment and repent to May God bless you all, O believers, that you may succeed.) [30-31: Al-Nour[30-31: Al-Nour[30-31: Al-Nour[30-31: Al-Nurma) Interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing himself in a dream while closing his eyes? To see yourself in a dream lowering your gaze with piety, faith, and perseverance in worship, as God Almighty says: “Tell the believers to lower their gaze and guard their shame.” The meaning of avoiding immorality, both what is visible and what is hidden, and good manners. The meaning of avoiding prohibitions, and avoiding what God forbids, disobedience, and avoid backbiting and gossip. What is the interpretation of looking down in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees that there is someone turning a blind eye to her, this indicates her marriage to a righteous and pious young man. Seeing the downward gaze of an unmarried girl indicates To the fulfillment of many of her dreams and desires. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a large snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a large snake in a dream: Seeing a snake in a dream is considered one of the visions that cause anxiety to its owner, whether the size of the fox is large or small, as it causes intense fear, anxiety, and suffering for many people, as the interpretation of this vision varies depending on the color and size of the snake, the nature of the dream, and social status. . Interpretation of the dream of seeing a large snake in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a large snake in a dream, as there are many interpretations and connotations that arise from seeing a snake in a dream, and scientists have worked to interpret the dream of seeing a large snake and a snake with a set of connotations and interpretations, such as: If a person sees In a dream, two large, fast-moving snakes indicate the arrival of livelihood, money, a stable life, and freedom from crises and problems. Seeing a snake or a large snake in a dream is a good sign for the dreamer in general, and God protects the dreamer from evil and troubles that cause him harm. When a person suffers from problems in his life If a person is going through a psychological crisis, seeing a large snake is a sign that he will get rid of problems and change his life to peace and happiness. Seeing a large snake in the dream of an unmarried woman and the snake in the house indicates her superiority and success in obtaining a job and assuming an excellent position at work. See also : Interpretation of dreams of seeing a mouse in a dream for a married and unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The well-known and also well-known interpreter scholar worked on interpreting the dream of seeing a snake in a dream with a set of connotations and interpretations that depended in its interpretation on the situation in which the snake is, such as: If You saw a large snake in a dream, this indicates the presence of a large number of enemies chasing a person in real life. If one sees a large snake in a dream, this means strength of character, good treatment, and discrimination in telling the truth and judging each other fairly. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a snake in A dream by Al-Nabulsi. The scientist Al-Nabulsi also worked on interpreting seeing a snake in a dream with a set of connotations and interpretations based on the color of the snake, such as: A large black snake in a dream shows a large number of people close to the person, who do not wish him well and have great hatred against him. If one sees in a dream A large green snake, as this is a sign of good skin with the appearance of goodness, good nutrition, and living a happy and safe life. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a chicken in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a big snake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation scholar Ibn Shaheen worked on interpreting a dream Seeing a large snake in a dream is fine, and the interpretation of this vision was based on the human condition in nature, including: Seeing a person with a snake or a large snake in a dream and the dreamer complains of fatigue, then this indicates the death of the disease and the return of health to its owner. But if the person is in debt And he saw a big snake in his dream, so he will change his hand for all his debts. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake in a dream and being alone

title: Interpretation of a black man in a dream A brown man in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you the dream of a strange or tall black man, Ibn Sirin, single, married, pregnant, and the meaning of the black man who chased me and I married a young black man. Interpretation of a black or brown man in a dream: A black man in a dream indicates success if he is a policeman or a judge, and any brown man It symbolizes goodness, unless it shows hostility to the fortuneteller. If you see in your dream a dark-haired man in your green garden, this indicates that you are heading towards problems that will accompany you for some time. If you dream that you are fighting with a black man, this indicates your inability to overcome the circumstances that Surrounding you, as well as the adversity that accompanies you. Moreover, seeing a black man in a dream means that you will have to work to support yourself or you will fail in love. If you see a dark old man or even an old man in your dream, it means that you will get sick. If you see a very good black man in a place where you do not expect to see him, It means that someone you trust will betray you. A black man in a dream is better if he appears smiling or handsome, and it is a sign of bad luck if his appearance in the dream is gloomy, sullen, or angry. A brown or black man indicates strength and distress and symbolizes a year in which there is profit Or travel or joy, if it rises, laden with gifts or good things such as fruits and vegetables. Brown or black in one’s dream It indicates money or wealth, especially if a girl shows a gap in her dream and her teeth appear white as snow. If an unmarried woman sees that she is marrying a Negro , she accepts an important event such as marriage, engagement, work, and work. If she sees that she is shaking hands in an elegant brown dress and a beautiful appearance, not skinny, then she is entangled with something she desires, and most likely the matter is financial or financial. A black or very dark man in a married woman’s dream is the one who sees in her dream that she She married a Negro and gave birth to a black or brown child from him, and the child was beautiful. A woman who sees in her dream that a handsome brown man enters her house bearing gifts, or sees that he is playing with her children or sitting at her table, then this is a good year, God willing. Nutrition level A black man or a black man in a pregnant woman’s dream If the woman sees a black man meeting her or entering her house and he is handsome or handsome, then in the interpretation he will be safe and in good health. The brown man is praised in all visions if he has a name with good connotation or meaning, and the basic principle in this interpretation is that The color black is praised in dreams, as long as it is not found in a predatory animal, which is a reptile. Or rodents, so it is praised by men, women, and everything else. The black color is repulsive to food, drink, or blood, and it is repulsive to liquids of all kinds, even paint. The black man in general in a pregnant woman’s dream is an expression of good news and a happy event. The black man and the stranger in the dream. You do not know him in waking life. This is his interpretation of the future or the unknown. If you see in your dream a tall black man, it symbolizes a long life, and in the interpretation it is profit and good hope. If the color is brown, it means safety in everything and it is worth it.

title: Interpretation of the intervention in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: A detailed interpretation of surgery in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many medical conditions that you find difficult to treat or relieve their pain without resorting to surgery performed by the most skilled and best doctors, as surgical operations differ in degrees of risk or success. This difference and difference in degrees of danger can occur. Healing and other main indicators that play an important role in determining and interpreting the dream, and from here we present the interpretation of surgery in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of a dream about kidney surgery: The kidneys are considered one of the most important parts of the human body that work to cleanse the body of salts and impurities, and here we find the interpretation of a dream about kidney surgery at As follows: Seeing a dream about an intervention in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates getting rid of all the pain that limits the dreamer and suffocates him in his reality. This vision also showed the end of problems and crises of all kinds. In addition, seeing an operation in a dream is evidence of some problems that may be solved. The dreamer, but by relying on God, he will overcome it. It is also one of the signs that indicates the mood of anxiety and fear that dominates the dreamer’s life. In addition, seeing the operation on the kidneys is one of the signs that lead to the passage of difficult periods that burden the dreamer. It also indicates positive changes that It will be experienced in the life of the close dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about zucchini in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about vulvar surgery. There are areas in the human body that a person must preserve and care for in particular and not others, and in particular this hadith was specific to the vulvar area, which can You are exposed to many health problems that can push a person to undergo surgical operations to reduce their pain, and from the point of view of our discussion of them, we present to you the interpretation of a dream about surgery in a dream about the vulva area as follows: Undergoing surgery in a dream is one of the signs that indicates the separation of sadness and grief from life. The dreamer. It is also indisputable evidence of the change of circumstances to God Almighty, and the elimination of crises and problems. Seeing intervention in a dream also indicates an end to the injustice that God suffered in his real life and victory over his enemies. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading Surah Al-Fatihah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about neck surgery. A dream about neck surgery has many interpretations indicated by the most skilled people with knowledge and understanding of the science of dreams, this science that has reflected many things in real life, and from this direction we are with you to distinguish the interpretation of dreaming about surgery in a dream in the direction shown in the following points. Whoever sees that he is undergoing surgery on his neck, this indicates that he is walking on the right path in which there is no deviation. Also, seeing a long neck in a person’s dream is evidence of the abilities that this person possesses, with which he occupies high and senior leadership positions. While the dream was of a thick neck. Evidence that the man is honest and trustworthy and takes up the responsibilities that fall on his shoulders and does not betray the trust. See also: Interpretation of a dream about an apartment in a dream by Ibn Si

title: Interpretation of dreams for a short man and a person of small stature in a dream

preview.html: We explain to you that my husband has become short, and the dream of a short and tall groom has become short. Interpretation of a short person in a dream Short stature in a dream represents neediness and incompetence, and seeing a short person or man in a dream represents failure in performing one’s duty or short-sightedness, which means that the dreamer lacks foresight. Vision and ambition are almost limited. Seeing a short man in a dream who is not married. If she sees that his shortness is acceptable, then she is satisfied with his daughter’s husband. He has little potential. If she sees that she is marrying a man shorter than her, then she will control or control her home. If she sees that she is marrying a short man If the face has ugly features, she will feel exhausted and this will be in her married or professional life, because shortness sometimes represents failure in the dream. A short man in a married woman’s dream. If a woman sees that her husband, who is tall in his wakefulness, has become as if he was short in his sleep, then this is most likely her interpretation of transient problems in matters related to nutrition. A strange and short man in a married woman’s dream indicates shortcomings in matters related to the affairs of the home or children. A short man in a dream, who is ugly or who is suffering. From a moral defect, it indicates unhappiness or psychological fatigue, and it is not good to see it in a dream on the part of a woman. If he enters her house and asks her for food and gives it to him, then this is a good interpretation, if signs of reassurance and happiness appear on his face, or he changes from the character of a dhimmi to a bright face. Or bright, and its interpretation is that goodness will flood her home, God willing, and this interpretation applies to pregnant women, divorcees, or widows. Interpretation of a dream about marriage due to short stature is if this person has an inappropriate appearance, unkempt hair, shabby clothes, and a pale face. In this case, the dream expresses bad luck in the matter of marriage. Himself or in any other matter. If the groom is short but at the same time handsome, good looking and dressed, as the dreamer feels some satisfaction towards him and may be attracted to him or attracted to him in the dream, so between the two lovers or lovers there will be love in this case, that The groom becomes short in stature. The dream is a symbol of relatively good luck only in emotional matters, which means that the girl in waking life is engaged to a young man and admires him, but financially. The circumstances are somewhat difficult, but in the end he remains a suitable son-in-law. Seeing a dead person of short stature in a dream. The short stature of the deceased in visions expresses his shortcomings in some acts of worship during his life and his appearance in the dream is shorter than it was when he was awake. Financial inability, poverty, and short stature of the deceased expresses the aggravation of debts or the inability to perform charitable works and alms. Interpretation of dreams: short stature - YouTube
